dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: After confirmation, the application cannot be changed

looking_for_pair.label: Looking for a Secret Santa
looking_for_pair.description: Your application is on the draw, we are looking for a Secret Santa for you!

paired.label: Paired, sending gifts...
paired.description: It's time to send gifts! Find out each other's addresses in a secret chat!

gift_sent.label: Your gift is sent
gift_sent.description: Your gift has been sent! It's yout turn!

gift_received.label: Done
gift_received.description: Your application has been successfully closed

dialog.title: Confirm your action
dialog.description: We hope you enjoy the gift! After confirmation, your application will be closed.

dialog.title: Confirm the action
